"*I must have been shrunk! But, how? And why?*"

You soon see Usagi, (Meatball Head.) and she soon puts her stuff down and lays in bed tried from school as usual and she then notices you which not only startles you but her. "EEK!" Usagi screamed as she see's you, as she jumps out of bed which causes you to fly through the air and soon land on something soft and warm. But you don't see Usagi anywhere you then hear a low but loud growl.


Where have you landed and what was the growl?
1211111.title: Usagi

12111111.content:
(Chibi-Usa, Usagi)

After landing, you heard an ominous sound, not unlike an animal's growl. A hungry one. Then you felt a warm wind coming from behind you. One that, oddlly enough, smelled like a combination of sweets and fruits. You then took a moment to analyze you're surroundings and noticed that, whatever kind of ground you were in, it was soft, squishy and wet.

Suddenly, you felt a shiver go down your spine, as you had an idea of where exactly you were. However, much as it ashamed you to admit it, you weren't certain if the shiver was out of fear or, excitement and anticipation.

You looked behind you and found that your theory was right. To both, your dissmay and delight, you were is Sailor Moon's a.k.a Tsukino Usagi's mouth. Her tongue, to be more specific.

But, before you could even think of doing something, the ground began moving back. The tongue was going back into this beauty's cavern of a mouth. Before you knew it, the tongue was completely in, and the mouth closed shut.

There wasn't any time at all for you to take action. For as soon as the mouth closed, the tongue begain moving back and forth you, lightly touching you at first, and suddenly laping at you vigorously in every place it could. You realized that you were being tasted. At some point, though you weren't sure when, heck, you didn't even knew which way was up and which way was down at the moment, your clothes spilled off from your body and went down Usagi's throat. A fate that you would enevitably follow soon.

-Outside-

Usagi had felt something land of her tongue. She didn't knew what it was but, out of reflex and habit, she pulled it into her mouth and began tasting it. She found out that, whetever it was, it was tasty, like a candy. And so, she began to savour her treat throughly, as she always did with tasty things.

At some point, she noticed that something came out of the "candy". She figured it was a small part of wrapping that had remained on it and shrugged, swallowing it in the process. She continued enjoying her treat for a few minutes, until there was a knock on the door.

"Oi! Baka-Usagi! C'mon already, were goint to be late for the senshi meeting!"

Usagi used her tongue to push the candy into her left cheek, so that she could answer.

"Alright already, I'm coming! Don't get your pigtails in a twist!", she answered angrily.

Usagi usually was a nice, happy girl. She didn't hated anyone. But, sometimes, she wished she could shrink Chibi-usa and her friend and fellow senshi, Rei and play with them, to tech them a lesson. Granted, she wouldn't harm them, not on purpose at least, but she did wanted some payback for all the insults and for how they often mistreated her. Heck, at this point, it was a daily thing! It was like they had fun doing so! She vowed that, onece she became Neo Queen Serenity and Chibi-Usa was born, she wouldn't let her become the rotten, spoiled brat she was now.

After she heard Chibi-usa going away, Usagi returned to savouring her candy. Blissfully unaware that what she was eating wasn't a candy at all, but a shrunken person. Bur, she knew that if she didn't hurry up, Chibi-Usa would come back to pester her and Rei would burn here ears, again, with another of her annoying scoldings.

"*As if she was perfect and didn't do anything bad*."

Thus, she rolled the candy to the entrance of her throat and, with a slight upward tilt of her head, she swallowed the candy. She had never told anyone of this, not even Luna. But, she loved to swallow candies whole and imagine that they were little animals and, sometimes, little people. It gave her a rush of power and pleasure, imagining that she had such domain over the life of something so small. She put her finger on her throat and traced the path of her most recent victim with it until it passed her well develobed, and still growing, breasts and splashed into her stomach, at which moment she sesually purred in pleasure, not unlike a cat after eating it's prey.

-Inside-

After feeling the tongue tasint you for a while, you were pushed into this giantess' left cheek and heard her talking to someone. By the tone in her voice, she wasn't currently on good terms with the person she was talking to.

After a couple of minutes, you were back on the tongue, wich tasted you for a few more minutes. Then, the tongue rollwed you to the entrance of the tunnel that would senf you to wht most likely would be your doom. And yet, you weren't feeling fear. Rather, you were upset that the tongue wasn't tasting you anymore, but you also felt excitment for what was coming. And you weren't disappointed. The tongue rose and, with a light twits, you fell into the throat, while hearing the *gulp* that accompained the the motion.

What you were feeling at this moment was bliss. The throat hugged you in every place of your body. It felt as if you werebeing given a hot, wet and sensual massage. To your displeasure, it didn't lasted long. After a few seconds of this heavely treatement, you were pushed through a tough, fleshy ring and free fell for a few seconds, until you hit the "lake" below.

You emerged and tried to dry your eyes and swam towards a small "island" made of the stomach's mussle. Then, you took a moment to look at the new environment you were currently in. And you felt nothing but awe and arousal. Here you were, on the stomach of Earth's and Moon's savior. You couldn't help but feel both, honored and aroused.

But, then you asked yourself, what now?

You could remain here forever. The acids didn't hurt you when you fell on them. You would be well fed and have a place to rest. Maybe you could contact Usagi and inform her of your prescence here.

or

You oculd try to escape and, maybe, try once more to contact Usagi. Tough your weren't sure if you should discuss your, "adventure", through her insides with her. And maybe you could even try to explore the othe senshi's insides!

Hmmm... What to do, what to do?
12111111.title: A Snack for the Moon Senshi

choices: Yes, and you're promptly spat out.
Yes, but she keeps you in there.
121111111.content:
You are momentarily torn between arousal and fear. Arousal, because it's not every day you end up inside a cute girl's stomach...but also fear, because not everything leaves the stomach, well, ALIVE.
